subject: Safety Officer Information Form - Joe Vilbrun Designated
body:
Good morning,

I am completing the Safety Officer Information form as requested in your July 23rd email. Please find the attached form with the following details:

• Lead Safety Officer: Joe Vilbrun
• All required church location and contact information completed
• Form deadline: November 30th

The completed form is attached and ready for your safety training announcements scheduled for early October.

Please let me know if you need any additional information.

This EMAIL IS LATE, So please forgive me!

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Best regards,
David
